nodes.text: Patitite Pattuna was a planet in the galaxy's Mid Rim, not far from Balnab, that was the homeworld of the tiny Patitite species. R2-D2 and C-3PO crash-landed on the planet after a nearby battle during the Clone Wars. R2-D2 accidentally crushed the planet's despot Hay-Zu, to which there was much rejoicing, and C-3PO introduced the natives to democracy, which prompted a civil war.
Patitite Pattuna first appeared in "Nomad Droids," the sixth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' fourth season, which originally aired on October 14, 2011
